SEARCH

Package vendingMachineSimulator

package vendingMachineSimulator
Vending Machine simulator for the SECOND phase of CCPROG3 major course output.
Since:
2023-06-01
Version:
1.1
Author:
Vance Gyan M. Robles
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Customer
    Represents a customer of the vending machine.
    Driver
    Driver class for executing the program.
    Item
    An item to be sold in a vending machine.
    MainController
    The controller model for the GUI, allows the view(s) to interact with the model
    MainModel
    Serves as the main model to interact with the different parts of the vending machine
    Maintenance
    Responsible for managing and maintaining the usability of Vending Machines.
    MainView
    GUI setup for the machine setup
    RegularVendingMachine
    A regular vending machine, can hold up to 40 item slots with a max capacity of 10 each.
    SpecialItem
    Represents a special item in the vending machine.
    SpecialVendingMachine
    Represents a special vending machine that can create custom special items.
    SpecialVendingView
    GUI setup for the Special Vending Machine
    VendingView
    GUI setup for the Regular Vending Machine
    Wallet
    Serves as the container and manager of denominations.
